sentences.english: Research on DGPS positioning accuracy under the tree canopy in forest land.
sentences.chinese: DGPS在林區及林冠下的定位精度分析。

sentences.english: Vigorously improve forest inhabitant people's livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 大力保障和改善林區民生。

sentences.english: Soil erosion and sub-humid forest region in southern India.
sentences.chinese: 土壤侵蝕與半溼潤森林區，南印度。

sentences.english: Huaihua city is an important forestry area in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 懷化市是湖南省的重點林區。

sentences.english: Zhongtiao Mountain forest area has an abundance of medicinal pteridophytes.
sentences.chinese: 山西中條山林區藥用蕨類植物豐富。

sentences.english: Woodland rodent species and distribution in highland Zhangjiakou district were investigated in the study.
sentences.chinese: 查清了張家口地區沿壩林區的齧齒動物種類和分佈。

sentences.english: Nanping belongs to one of forestry area of emphasis in the south.
sentences.chinese: 福建南平是南方重點林區之一。

sentences.english: Fire fighters hosed down a bushfire.
sentences.chinese: 消防隊員撲滅了一場林區大火。

sentences.english: The changes of the seasons are less obtrusive on spots of this kind than amid woodland scenery.
sentences.chinese: 在這種地方，四季景色的遞邅不如林區那樣突出。

sentences.english: The project has established nurseries and plantations to regenerate the forest.
sentences.chinese: 爲了林區的更新，該項目建立了苗圃和林場。

sentences.english: Based on investigation for the central town, land use four suggestions on countermeasures are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 通過調研，對林區中心鎮用地規劃提出四點對策建議。

sentences.english: Tianlin county was one of the key forest regions of Guangxi province.
sentences.chinese: 田林縣是廣西重點林區縣之一。

sentences.english: The area also contains forests of palm, cypress, mangrove and pine.
sentences.chinese: 大沼澤的林區裏有棕櫚樹，絲柏。

sentences.english: They ran a railroad into the forest region.
sentences.chinese: 他們修築鐵路使之通入林區。

sentences.english: Please go to this address in Shihlin.
sentences.chinese: 請到士林區的這個地址。

sentences.english: Forested areas sustain almost as high a population as the agricultural sites.
sentences.chinese: 森林區的種羣密度與農業區同樣的高。

definition: Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan

definition: Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
